snippet.title: Official Detective Grimoire Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Detective Grimoire by Armor Games Inc

A brand new mystery adventure game.

Hunt through the beautifully hand-painted swamp for clues, interrogate the cast of fully voiced and animated suspects, solve puzzles and uncover the secret of the swamp!

Detective Grimoire is a charming and mysterious adventure, featuring a variety of strange and unique interactions with the bizarre residents of the swamp, a compelling and challenging murder mystery to solve, and an original award nominated soundtrack.

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/detective-grimoire/id740602894

Homepage:

http://detectivegrimoire.com/
